argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ghomf.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | ghomf.2 | |- W = ran H |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_elghomOLD | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp ) -> ( F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) <-> ( F : X --> W /\ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( F ` x ) H ( F ` y ) ) = ( F ` ( x G y ) ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprbda | |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp ) /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> F : X --> W ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3impa | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> F : X --> W ) |
